note.p: Research Field: Natural philosophy, medicine, botany

Career: Practised medicine, Haarlem; Director of the Museum for Nautral History and Physical Instruments (1784); made electrical machines; Secretary of the Holl[?] Maatschappij van Wetenschappen, Haarlem (1795)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1838 No 35 p 99
